property.name: Rules
property.value: (Dryad Arbor isn't a spell, it's affected by summoning sickness, and it has "{T}: Add {G}.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Touch no tree, break no branch, and speak only the question you wish answered." - Von Yomm, elder druid, to her initiates

property.name: Artist
property.value: Eric Fortune

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {BR}, {T}: Add {B}{B}, {B}{R}, or {R}{R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shamans of Kar-Sengir claim that their sun sets because it can no longer bear the gaze of those pain-carved cliffs.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Anthony S. Waters

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. Each opponent gains 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spring is the most beautiful season in the grove, when the new leaves open from their ember-buds in a race of leaping flames.

property.name: Artist
property.value: David Hudnut

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} or {W}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Horizon Canopy: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The great leaves are resilient underfoot. Heavy steps do not bruise them, but release a sweet and spicy scent.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Michael Komarck

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W}. Activate only if you control an Island. {T}: Add {U}. Activate only if you control a Plains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To find its center is to find one's own.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jason Chan

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {U}. If you played a land this turn, add {B} instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Westfolk wept, and their tears wore winding rivers into the cheek of the world." - Glem the Lonebard, "Origins of Kholon"

property.name: Artist
property.value: Chris J. Anderson

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. Morph {2} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing lives within it, yet there is life.

property.name: Artist
